doctor resigns THE British prime minister's director of communications Andy Coulson has resigned amid accusations that he was aware of phone hacking by his journalists while working as editor of the "News of the World" newspaper. I can today confirm that I've resigned as Downing Street director of communications, Andy Coulson said in a statement.
